locale.name: tr_TR
locale.message: mEDRA İhraç/Kayıt Eklentisi
mEDRA kayıt ajansı ile DOI (O4DOI) biçimi ve DOI'lere kayıt için Onix'de sayı, makale ve dizgi ihracı.

If you want to register DOIs with mEDRA, please follow the directions on the mEDRA homepage to receive a username and password. If you do not have your own username and password you'll still be able to export into the mEDRA XML format (Onix for DOI) but you cannot register your DOIs with mEDRA from within OJS. Please note that the password will be saved as plain text, i.e. not encrypted, due to the mEDRA registration service requirements.
Please configure the mEDRA export plug-in before using it for the first time.
Lütfen mEDRA ihraç eklentisini yapılandırınız:
Kullanıcı adı
Lütfen mEDRA kullanıcı adınızı giriniz. Kullanıcı adı virgül içeremez.
The name of the institution registered at mEDRA:
Please enter the institution that is registered at mEDRA.
Person to be contacted by mEDRA in case of technical inquiries:
Kurulum:
Please enter the institution that is technically responsible for DOI export (e.g. the institution hosting your web server).
İletişim Kurulacak Kişi:
Lütfen iletişim kurulacak teknik kişi giriniz.
E-posta
Lütfen teknik bir iletişim e-postası giriniz.
Please choose the country to be informed as 'publication country' to mEDRA.
Please choose whether you want to export issues as 'works' or 'manifestations'.
iş
ortaya koyma
Yeniden Kur

Click this button if you want to treat this object as if it had never been registered before (e.g. when mEDRA sends an error message by email on first registration). Do NOT click this button when you receive an error message after a failed update!
NB: DOIs assigned to articles will be exported to mEDRA as 'works'. DOIs assigned to galleys will be exported as 'manifestations'.

Kullanım: {$scriptName} {$pluginName} export xmlFileName journal_path {issues|articles|galleys} objectId1 [objectId2] ... {$scriptName} {$pluginName} register journal_path {issues|articles|galleys} objectId1 [objectId2] ...
